UniprotID	Q8IV01
Accession	Q8IV01
EntryName	SYT12_HUMAN
ProteinName	Synaptotagmin-12 (Synaptotagmin XII) (SytXII)
GeneName	SYT12
Length	421
Function	Synaptic vesicle phosphoprotein that enhances spontaneous neurotransmitter release but does not effect induced neurotransmitter release (By similarity). Unlike other synaptotagmins, it does not bind Ca(2+) or phospholipids (By similarity). Essential for mossy-fiber long-term potentiation in the hippocampus (By similarity).
Subcellular Location	Cytoplasmic vesicle; Secretory vesicle; Synaptic vesicle membrane
